mapper.select: select NOTICE_AVATAR, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_SUBTITLE from notice where member_id =#{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into notice(MEMBER_ID, NOTICE_AVATAR, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_SUBTITLE, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_ID) values(#{memberId}, #{noticeAvatar}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeSubtitle}, sysdate, notice_seq.nextval )
